General.Name: Emeco Holdings Limited
General.Description: Emeco Holdings Limited provides heavy earthmoving equipment and mining service solutions in Australia. The company rents trucks, excavators, dozers, loaders, and graders. It is also involved in the maintenance and remanufacturing of various components of heavy earthmoving equipment; mechanical and boilermaker repair services; and sandblasting and painting services. In addition, the company offers fabrication and boiler making; and labor hire and field services, as well as repairs and rebuilds machines. Emeco Holdings Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Perth, Australia.
